title: Zinc-Related Proteasome Variants in Type 1 Diabetes: An in Silico-Guided Case-Control Study.
abstract: The proteasome is a multicatalytic complex responsible for protein degradation and regulation of immune responses, and has been implicated in type 1 diabetes mellitus (T1DM) pathogenesis. Zinc (Zn This case-control study included 654 patients with T1DM and 573 subjects without DM from Southern Brazil. SNPs were selected through in silico analysis using MIB docking platform to identify Zn The  The
